titleStmt.title: The lives of all the princes of Orange, from William the Great, founder of the Common-wealth of the United Provinces written in French by the Baron Maurier, in the year 1682, and published at Paris, by order of the French King ; to which is added the life of His present Majesty King William the Third, from his birth to his landing in England, by Mr. Thomas Brown ; together with all the princes heads taken from original draughts.
Mémoires pour servir à l'histoire de Hollande et des autres Provinces-Unies. English
titleStmt.author: Aubery du Maurier, Louis, 1609-1687.

titleStmt.title: The lives of all the princes of Orange, from William the Great, founder of the Common-wealth of the United Provinces written in French by the Baron Maurier, in the year 1682, and published at Paris, by order of the French King ; to which is added the life of His present Majesty King William the Third, from his birth to his landing in England, by Mr. Thomas Brown ; together with all the princes heads taken from original draughts.
Mémoires pour servir à l'histoire de Hollande et des autres Provinces-Unies. English
titleStmt.author: Aubery du Maurier, Louis, 1609-1687.
Brown, Thomas, 1663-1704.

notesStmt.note: Originally published, 1680, under title: Mémoires pour servir à l'histoire de Hollande et des autres Provinces-Unies.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
